DOC.criteria: Subjects must typical anginal pain last least 20 min. , long 24h . ECG confirm ischaemia ST segment depression > = 1,0 mm least 2 lead , , negative T wave > = 2,0 mm least 2 lead . Positive troponin I ( TnI ) . Subjects must demonstrate willingness participate study comply procedure sign write informed consent and/or parent legal guardian must sign write informed consent . Subjects observed designate washout period prohibit medication . Subjects use investigational product within 30 day prior enrollment .
